org.openbase.bco.ontology.lib.utility

Interface StringModifier


  • public interface StringModifier
    This interface contains methods to modify strings as one-liner. Mostly it's used to process the unit data, cause they be liable to normed forms (e.g. nomenclature) to store them in the BCO ontology.
    Author:
    agatting on 17.02.17.

      Logger to print information.

    • Method Detail

      • addBcoNamespace

        static String addBcoNamespace(String input,
                              boolean fullNamespace)
                       throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method adds the BCO namespace prefix OntConfig.NAMESPACE or rather OntConfig.OntExpr#NS to the input string. Furthermore, can be used to change the named prefixes (OntConfig.OntExpr#NS to OntConfig.NAMESPACE and the other way around.
        Parameters:
        input - is the string, which should be extended with the BCO namespace prefix.
        fullNamespace - sets the kind of namespace. If true the full namespace OntConfig.NAMESPACE will be added. Otherwise the short form OntConfig.OntExpr#NS.
        Returns:
        the input string with selected namespace prefix.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • getLocalName

        static String getLocalName(String ontologyNodeName)
                    throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the local name of the ontology node name. In general, every node in the ontology is consisting of the ontology uri and the local name. The method crops the ontology uri (detection of separator "#" (hash)) or the defined prefix (currently OntConfig.OntExpr.NS). Hint: Jena method getLocalName() doesn't work perfectly in this application for all names (e.g. local name starts with numbers). RDF historical reasons.
        Parameters:
        ontologyNodeName - is the ontology node name (uri + local name), which should be returned.
        Returns:
        the input ontology node name without uri. If no uri could be detected the input is returned unchanged.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the parameter is null.

      • firstCharToLowerCase

        static String firstCharToLowerCase(String input)
                            throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method transforms the first char of the input string to lower case.
        Parameters:
        input - is the string, which first char should be transformed in lower case.
        Returns:
        the input string with first char in lower case.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • getServiceTypeName

        static String getServiceTypeName(rst.domotic.service.ServiceTemplateType.ServiceTemplate.ServiceType serviceType)
                          throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the service type name in camel case, e.g. POWER_STATE_SERVICE to PowerStateService.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - is the service type for transformation.
        Returns:
        the service type name in camel case.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • getUnitTypeName

        static String getUnitTypeName(rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType unitType)
                       throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the unit type name in camel case, e.g. COLORABLE_LIGHT to ColorableLight.
        Parameters:
        unitType - is the unit type for transformation.
        Returns:
        the unit type name in camel case.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • getCamelCaseName

        static String getCamelCaseName(String input)
                        throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method transforms the input string from upper case to camel case, like e.g. HELLO_WORLD to HelloWorld.
        Parameters:
        input - is the string for transformation.
        Returns:
        the input string in camel case.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • addQuotationMarks

        static String addQuotationMarks(String input)
                         throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the input string in literal form, means in quotation marks (e.g. "input").
        Parameters:
        input - is the string for transformation. Existing quotation marks (ore or two) will be considered.
        Returns:
        the input as literal string (in quotation marks). If input is null only quotation marks will be returned.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • convertToLiteral

        static String convertToLiteral(Object data,
                               OntConfig.XsdType xsdType)
                        throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method converts the input data to a string based on the sparql literal syntax. The associated data type is set by the input xsdType. Input data and xsdType must be matching.
        Parameters:
        data - is the input data, which should be convert to a literal syntax.
        xsdType - is the data type to set the kind of literal. Must match with the data type of the input data.
        Returns:
        a SPARQL literal as string.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case at least one parameter is invalid.

      • getServiceTypeNameFromStateMethodName

        static String getServiceTypeNameFromStateMethodName(String stateMethodName)
                                             throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method extracts the service type name of the input state method name (e.g. getPowerState to powerStateService).
        Parameters:
        stateMethodName - is the state method name, which includes the needed service type name.
        Returns:
        the service type name in camel case (first char lower case, e.g. powerStateService)
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null or no valid state (name).
